channel.title: Comments on: Books: The Year Without Pants

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/10/21/books-the-year-without-pants/#comment-4107">Beau Lebens</a>.
I can only imagine how strange it was for you, Mike, and Andy. I at least had one degree of separation :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Beau Lebens.

I can only imagine how strange it was for you, Mike, and Andy. I at least had one degree of separation ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Beau Lebens
item.dc:creator: Beau Lebens
item.description: Great write-up/notes Joseph. It's really interesting hearing/reading other people's thoughts on this book, both inside and outside of Automattic. It's definitely weird reading a book where you are a part of the story, so having some external perspective is fascinating at times.
item.content:encoded: Great write-up/notes Joseph. It’s really interesting hearing/reading other people’s thoughts on this book, both inside and outside of Automattic. It’s definitely weird reading a book where you are a part of the story, so having some external perspective is fascinating at times.
